text: Knema scortechinii is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. ==References== * Chua, L.S.L. 1998. Knema scortechinii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema scortechinii
